actions.description: The bone roc makes one Beak attack and two Talons attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.name: Beak

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Talons
